FERDINANDEUM

online edition

about:

We invite you for a virtual art experience. Since the Ferdinandeum cannot be visited due to the current situation, we will give you as your host an opportunity to experience art. There will be four events with different themes. You have the option to participate and express yourself with assets, GIFs and pens or just watch. You can meet on the virtual platform mozillahubs or watch on twitch.tv. At mozillahubs there are only 24 seats available, first come first serve. But you have the possibility to watch this on twitch.tv and if someone leaves the room you can move in


For further information, please click on the links below.

events:

06.12.2020, 10am

LOCKDOWN (TEST)

13.12.2020, 10am
